text: genetic Field, the Halls of Amenti will remain open to anyone in the Bridge Zone who can assemble the fifth strand, but fifth strand assembly may now take several incarnations. The Hall of Records remains open in the Bridge Zone, as long as Earth’s grid stays aligned with the Alcyone spiral, but it will transmit data at a much slower rate. The grids of Earth and Tara complete their separation and the ascension cycle comes to a close, as humanity faces its new reality within three dif- ferent tracks of time. One part of humanity will experience the future in the D-3 Phantom Earth time cycle, another part will move into the age of enlightenment within the Bridge Zone-Inner Earth time cycle, 2213 years 228
